description: This Dart source file implements a WebSocket signaling client for a WebRTC-based video call platform, using Socket.IO for real-time communication. It manages connection lifecycle, event handling, and message emission between clients and servers.

classes.name: SignalingClient
classes.description: A WebSocket-based signaling client that manages connection, event handling, and message passing for peer-to-peer communication in a video calling platform.

methods.name: SignalingClient
methods.description: Constructor initializing the signaling client with environment configuration.

methods.name: isConnected
methods.description: Getter to check if the socket is currently connected.

methods.name: _emitToListeners
methods.description: Internal method to propagate events to registered listeners.

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Establishes the signaling WebSocket connection and sets up event handlers.

methods.name: joinRoom
methods.description: Sends a request to join a specific room with a participant ID.

methods.name: sendOffer
methods.description: Sends an SDP offer to a specific participant.

methods.name: sendAnswer
methods.description: Sends an SDP answer to a specific participant.

methods.name: sendIceCandidate
methods.description: Sends ICE candidate information to a specific participant.

methods.name: inviteUser
methods.description: Sends an invite to a user to join a specific room.
